showScoreExcerpt:
"The musical is marred by contrived storytelling and slathered-on sentimentality. Through clunky expository dialogue that over-elaborates about everything. implausibly soap-operaish plot turns, and perfunctory songs that alternate between soaring ballads and soaring anthems, 'Allegiance' dramatically wrong-foots it at nearly every turn. What helps improve things are the staging and performancesâ€¦'Allegiance' relies on a first-rate cast and production to provide its emotional force."
